title: Jordan Peterson, Dallas Willard and the loss of Moral Knowledge
description:
Should Doctor Melfi help make Tony Soprano a better husband, mobster and killer? Is there such a thing as moral knowledge? Can we know it? We've turned the corner in some ways from moral skeptics to moral crusaders but without any discussion of moral knowledge, what it is, where and how it may be found. 

Jordan Peterson on the BBC is asked if a transwoman is a "real" woman. https://youtu.be/pqPNgexIP2g 

Dillahunty vs. Slick https://youtu.be/EKlycI9ZKsY
Don Hoffman Ted Talk https://youtu.be/oYp5XuGYqqY
Dallas Willard on the Disappearance of Moral Knowledge Part 1 https://youtu.be/Tim3EquzzPk Part 2 https://youtu.be/Y2vD-KujOdY 

My previous video on the Persistence of Guilt https://youtu.be/QyLM6eYrh0I The Article http://www.iasc-culture.org/THR/THR_article_2017_Spring_McClay.php

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
